title: Cant build after updating my NETFramework Version
body:
<!-- NOTE: The MSBuild team receives a lot of issues and we need to prioritize them accordingly. Please understand that we may not get to your issue for some time. -->
<!-- This is a template that helps us provide quicker feedback. Please use any relevant sections and delete anything you don't need. -->

<!--
* Here are some useful links to help you figure out what's wrong.
* Our wiki: https://github.com/microsoft/msbuild/blob/master/documentation/wiki/Home.md
* General Help: https://github.com/microsoft/msbuild/blob/master/documentation/wiki/Something's-wrong-in-my-build.md
* Tips & Tricks: https://github.com/microsoft/msbuild/blob/master/documentation/wiki/MSBuild-Tips-%26-Tricks.md
-->

### Issue Description

Hey there, i actually cant rebuild my program, which is compiled with MSBuild. 
Right now im getting this errormessage: 

Microsoft.Bcl.Build.targets(243, 5): Could not locate C:\Users\Daniel.Beller\projects\Enerlisa\Energieportal.DataAccess\packages.config.  Ensure that this project has Microsoft.Bcl.Build installed and packages.config is located next to the project file.

This happened after i renewed my NETFramework Version.
I'll be glad for help.

Thank you.

### Steps to Reproduce

Intellij Rider Log: 

"C:\Users\Daniel.Beller\projects\Enerlisa\Energieportal.DataAccess\Energieportal.DataAccess.csproj" (GetTargetPath target) (3:2) ->
       (BclBuildValidateNugetPackageReferences target) -> 
         C:\Users\Daniel.Beller\.nuget\packages\microsoft.bcl.build\1.0.21\build\Microsoft.Bcl.Build.targets(243,5): error : Could not locate C:\Users\Daniel.Beller\projects\Enerlisa\Energieportal.DataAccess\packages.config.  Ensure that this project has Microsoft.Bcl.Build installed and packages.config is located next to the project file.


### Expected Behavior

This Error should be skipped or ignored in order to build correctly.


### Actual Behavior

This Error Message appears and my program cant be build


### Ask us questions

Can you help me with figuring out on how to fix that behavior?

nodes.body:
Team Triage: 
1. What exactly does it mean to update your `NETFramework` here? 
1. Does this only happen in Rider?
1. Does this happen on the command line with msbuild.exe?
1. Can you [provide a binlog](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/master/documentation/wiki/Providing-Binary-Logs.md)?
Team triage: closing due to lack of response. If you're still seeing this please let us know.
